scripts.android-pro: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && yarn switch-pro && npx react-native run-android --variant=ProductDebug
scripts.android-gs: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native run-android --variant=GueststagingDebug
scripts.ios-pro: yarn switch-pro && arch -x86_64 npx react-native run-ios
scripts.ios-gs: yarn switch-gs && arch -x86_64 npx react-native run-ios
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn install && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && arch -x86_64 pod install
scripts.dap: npx jetify && cd android && yarn switch-pro && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleProductRelease && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/product/release/app-product-release.apk
scripts.dags: npx jetify && cd android && yarn switch-gs && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleGueststagingRelease && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/develop/release/app-develop-release.apk
scripts.digs: yarn switch-gs && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace Riraku.xcworkspace -scheme Riraku_gs -archivePath './build/Riraku_gs' && cd ..
scripts.dip: yarn switch-pro && cd ios && xcodebuild archive -workspace Riraku.xcworkspace -scheme Riraku_product -archivePath './build/Riraku_product' && cd ..
